resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

Welcome to DAP2PNET an alternative app based on a decentralized p2p model which provides end-to-end encryption.
In order to use the network, you must provide a Certificate Signing Request (CSR) to the Registration Server.
This app does that for you! It generates a RSA-2048 bit key pair which is used to sign the created CSR. Once you are registered, the server generates a new ID for that identity and you can optionally store it to keep using it later.
You can contact your friends if they share their ID and Public Key with you. Once you have both values, come back and add a new contact providing the information.
The underlying p2p model of the network's architecture is entirely based on the Kad network. That means that a Distributed Hash Table (DHT) is maintained by the peers of the network. When you wish to contact your friends, you start querying the nodes which their ID is close to your friend's ID.
Privacy is a concern so try to use multiple IDs for distinct communications.
